long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to modify the color theme of Twitter.com, change the font, with many other features soon to come!

For more info, join the Twitter Theme Engine Discord Server! https://discord.gg/aRMypCymuv
